Portfolio About me

About me

My name is Max

I moved to Prague a long time ago and have been living here for more than 10 years and studied here at the university. A creative thinker, adept in software development and working with various data structures. I can solve non-standard problems very creatively and also love to ride on snowboards.

Front-End
Innovative Front End Developer with experience building and maintaining responsive websites.
Back-End
Goal-oriented mid backend developer with extensive expertise in website architecture design and web API design.
UI/UX design
Master of creating inovative design.
Test automation
